Andrew is a journalism student at Stony Brook University entering his sophomore year PERIOD He is a tennis coach at the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center while he is not at Stony Brook working with students of varying ages and levels with a focus on the USTAS Quickstart  and Under initiative PERIOD He also is an editorial writer for New York and Long Island Tennis Magazines PERIOD
